General.Name: Shandong Weifang Rainbow Chemical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Weifang Rainbow Chemical Co., Ltd produces, distributes, and markets agrochemicals and pesticides in China. The company offers herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, plant growth regulators, and seed treatments. It operates in approximately 80 countries and 5 continents. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.
